Type a unique username of the contact you want to add. Ask your contact for his username.

Your account is prepared!

But there is some time skew in your device clock and server clock so your certificate is not yet valid. You have to wait some time until you will be able to login. 

Please wait: %1$s minutes, %2$s seconds
Problem occurred, probably due to Internet connection, please try again later.
An internet connection is required to sign in PhoneX. Check your connection and try again.
Connection to the server cannot be established, probably due to Internet connection. Please try again later.
Problem occurred, server returned unexpected result. \n\nYou have probably outdated application version, try update please.
Problem occurred, server returned unexpected result.
Problem occurred, returned certificate is invalid.
Your login or password is invalid.
Your account is disabled. Please contact your manager.
Trial version for your account expired.
Your trial account is about to expire.\n\nAccount will be invalid in %1$s days, %2$s hours

Your system time is not synchronized with server time. This causes problems with login.

Server time: %1$s
Your time is shifted forward by %1$s.
Your time is shifted backward by %1$s.
Problem with opening encrypted database. Cannot continue. \n\nIf problem repeats, please consider removing all application data or reinstalling application.
Sending CSR to server to sign
Encrypting private key with new password
Do you really want to delete this account?
Password is too short. Minimum length is 8 characters.
Please wait until your certificate becomes valid.\n\nTime to wait: %s seconds.
You are not allowed to call this number.
Request timeout. Server or callee didn\'t respond in time. Try again later please.
Callee is gone, it existed on server but is not available here any more.
Call request cannot reach destination. Try again later please.
Temporarily Unavailable. It was unable to establish direct connection to destination or it was timeouted. Try again later please.
Service unavailable, server is probably too busy right now. Try again later please
Call cannot be made because you are not registered in the network.
Unknown error in establishing a call. Please try again. If problem persists, please try to restart PhoneX.
You have a missed call from %1$s at %2$s.
ZRTP hash does not match (SDP vs. ZRTP hello). Attacker may be in the media! Error code:
You\'ve missed a call from the number:
Certificate for user \"%s\" was not found, cannot verify signature
Certificate for user \"%s\" is invalid, cannot verify signature
Unspecified error during signature verification for user \"%s\"
Checks for new certificates of contacts.
Synchronization is scheduled. Will be performed on the background.
Checks encryption keys for file transfer.
Synchronization is scheduled. Will be performed on the background.
PhoneX is an application for secure communication - encrypted calls, messages and file transfer between users.
You can try 7-days Trial license for free or buy a Full license on our website www.phone-x.net.
Generating keys needed for file transfer.
How to add a new contact?

Say you are user "alice" and want to add a new user called "eve" to your contact list. You have to be logged in on the main screen. Click on the button in the lower right corner and then click Add account.

In the dialog box, enter the user name of the second user - "eve". You also may fill the Display name text, this is an alias for your contact. If you don\'t put any alias, his user name will be displayed instead. Let "In whitelist" be ticked for now. At the end, click Add button.

After the user has been added, he/she will be shown in the contact list. In the contact list also status of each user is displayed. Two possible statuses are Online and Offline (here user Eve Hidden is offline).

Important: Both user (Alice and Eve) have to add each other into their contact lists to be able to call or send messages to each other. This prevents any user from receiving calls or messages from users he/she doesn\'t know - protection from SPAMing and unwanted behaviour.
File download error, please, try again later.
Generic download error occurred. Please, try again later.
Generic download error occurred. File is probably invalid.
No downloaded file found for this message.

Downloaded file was not found. It was probably deleted.

plurals.name: file_dialog_decrypt_confirm
plurals.item: This file will be decrypted to the Download directory.\n\nPlease note, that after decrypting the file will be accessible by all installed applications.
These files will be decrypted to the Download directory.\n\nPlease note, that after decrypting the files will be accessible by all installed applications.

resources.string: This file will be decrypted to the Download directory in order to open it in third party app.\n\nPlease note, that after decrypting the file will be accessible by all installed applications.
These files were not decrypted because of an error:
Do you really want to delete this message?
You have already been issued a Trial license. Only one Trial license per phone is allowed.
Your account has been successfully created.
To verify your request, please type captcha code in the box below.
Unable to add user, no such user exists.
Voice call is not supported on the remote device.
PhoneX %1$s revision %2$d is available. Do you want to update?
Please set up a new password.
Requirements:\n• Min 8 characters.\n• Contains letters and numbers.
Password and confirmed password must match.
Password has to contain at least one number.
Password has to contain at least one letter.
Some of the selected files could not be found.
The message will be sent to each recipient separately.
Maximum number of users for message broadcast is %d.
Message is being sent to provided recipients.
Some files from message cannot be found on file system:\n
All files missing on file system, cannot forward the message.
You have been logged out because someone has logged in using same credentials on a different device.
P2P sessions are blocked in call session forcing all traffic go through relay server. Degrades call performance, protects your IP.
P2P is allowed for call. Increases call performance but reveals your IP to the callee.
Please select your username, which will serve as your unique identifier.
Username can contain only letters, numbers, dash and underscore characters and has to be 3-18 characters long.
By continuing, you agree to terms of use.
Provided code has already been used.
Provided code has expired and is no longer valid.
Do you really want to reject this file? It will be deleted permanently.
Your limit is %d messages per day.
Your license has expired. Purchase a new license to get access to premium features such as secure voice calls, file transfer and unlimited messaging.
For secure communication with your colleagues, business partners and clients. Individual pricing provided.
Purchase a new license or continue in limited mode.
Your license expires in less than a week.
Your license expires at %s. If you wish to use premium features (calls, file transfer, unlimited messaging) after the expiration, purchase a new license.
Your license expires in less than a day.
Your license expires in less than a day. If you wish to use premium features (calls, file transfer, unlimited messaging) after the expiration, purchase a new license.

Your license has expired. PhoneX is now in limited mode (%d outgoing messages per day). Receiving calls or messages is not restricted. If you wish to continue using PhoneX without limitations, please purchase a new license.
Photo has been saved to secure storage as %s
Camera is not available.\nPlease close applications, that may be using camera.
%s wants you to add him to contact list.
Logs help us to solve issues faster. The sent logs do not contain any private information. The process may take up to a minute.
You have reached your outgoing messages limit. If you\'d like to send more messages, please purchase one of the applications packages available in to store.
You have no more outgoing call minutes. To purchase more minutes, please check our call packages or subscriptions available in to store.
You have reached your outgoing files limit. If you\'d like to send more files, please purchase one of the applications packages available in to store.
Overview of units you have available.
Error while loading purchased products. Please check your internet connection or try again later please.
Error while loading available products. Please check your internet connection or try again later please.

Call was terminated because remote side has an incoming cellular call.

PhoneX cannot control cellular calls thus they take priority over PhoneX calls. On cellular activity PhoneX is blocked from microphone and internet connection may be innaccessible (e.g., on 3G).

You can retry the call when the remote contact is available again.

Call had to be terminated because of an incoming cellular call.

PhoneX cannot control cellular calls thus they take priority over PhoneX calls. On cellular activity PhoneX is blocked from microphone and internet connection may be innaccessible (e.g., on 3G).

When you finish cellular call you can try to make PhoneX call again.
Unable to finish purchase operation, try again later please.
Your purchase of \'%s\' has been successfully completed.
There are no new licenses to load.
Licenses were successfully reloaded. The number of new licenses is %d.
Unknown error while loading licenses. Try again later please.
Protect communication with your contacts and invite them to use PhoneX:
Let\'s switch to encrypted communication using PhoneX: %s
Make truly private voice calls with other PhoneX users. PhoneX uses internet connection only.
PhoneX contact list is separated from system\'s contact list. Add new contact by simply clicking add button and entering a username.
Lock your application with PIN and prevent data leak in case your phone is lost or stolen.
Files you send or receive are automatically stored in encrypted storage and cannot be opened outside the application.
Select username and password and create your PhoneX account, no phone number is required.
Would you like to skip the introduction?
General error occurred during the operation. Please contact PhoneX support for your password recovery.
No recovery email is associated with given username. For further help recovering your password, please contact PhoneX support.
Recovery code has been sent recently. Try again later.
You have to wait 5 seconds before trying again.
Recovery code you entered is not valid. Please try again or generate a new one.
Recovery code has been sent to your email. Code is valid for next %s.
To reset your password, enter your username. You will receive an email with your recovery code for one-time login and password reset.
Email to send a recovery code in case of forgotten password.
No recovery email is set up! In case of forgotten password, you may lose access to your account.
Recovery email is used in case of forgotten password. It won\'t be shared with other third parties.
System was not able to connect to any Bluetooth headset.
